attributes.action: Put fuel tax to normal vat levels and then place tax on food
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Put the tax on fuel to normal vat levels.
2. Place tax on food.
As there is more people that buy food than drive.
3. Give low paid, low income or the old. a photo id card that allows discount of some tax from food at the checkouts
4.Or some type of food stamps that allow discount of tax.
5, So the tax system cannot be ripped off. use the benefits agency to do the card or stamps idea
